author: Alexandru Bogdan
comment: Latest update destroyed battery life. I had at least a month on a pack of batteries. Now I have a week at best. Fix this!!! It is ruining the device !

author: Sophie Musters
comment: I love Nuki. I have the lock and bridge. Pairing the bridge was not as easy. It wasn't clear to me if the pairing was successful or failed. Big issue for me although is that the smartwatch app does not work properly on my Moto 360. It says my phone is not paired but it is paired. Also I'd like to use my watch to open the door without having to have my phone on me. Let me know if you guys will do something about this

author: Neil Bisatt
comment: Will a version be released for the Samsung S3 Frontier smart watch?

author: Mark Morrison
comment: Works great

author: Michael R
comment: The app has room for improvement and I hope that they keep improving things. There is also scope for added hardware, entry pads etc. But all in all it's a great start and it works well.

author: Alexander Alten-Lorenz
comment: Geonfencing often not work, and the BT connection is flaky sometimes. Overall the concept is brilliant and I never want to miss my Nuki.

author: Sérgio Dourado
comment: Works great
Funktioniert wie versprochen

author: rugbug89
comment: The app has been working wonderfully and smoothly.  Installation was done in less than 2mins and we were able to use it straight away.  No problem connecting the bridge and using it remotely or with Nuki Web.  Still trying to understand auto-unlock function but we will get use to it and hope a better update will come soon.  Fob is not always accurate unless it is really close to the door.  But we are overall quite satisfied and looking forward to see how the products will progress.

author: Yuval Asaraf
comment: App is good. Takes a few seconds to respond. Locking cycle a bit long an noisy.  Auto unlock function works after a long wait at the door.

author: Travis Mielonen
comment: Works flawlessly. When inviting people you only get one chance to share the invite code, I wish this were saved with the user list somehow.

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hello Travis,

thank you for your feedback. I'll forward this feedback to the developing-team.
Keep us up to date with feedback.

author: Mostafa Yossef
comment: Firmware update isn't working, everything else is good

author: Povilas Butkus
comment: Super app and lock system! Works great.

author: Ehab Kirellous Bassilli
comment: This product is not ready for commercial use.   1. I purchased the Nuki bridge and lock. The bridge didn't work (for a well known issue). I created some keys on my phone but then discovered that the invitation code expires after 24 hours.   2. I cannot generate an invitation code or share a key that already exists.   3.  The distance between the bridge and the lock is pitiful.   4. I used the android bridge - this works, but you cannot leave a phone in a house  The software is buggy. Very clumsy design.

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content: Hello Ehab, Thank you for the feedback. We are always trying to improve our product and hope that we can provide you with a suitable product in the near future. We will consider the points for further updates. If you are having problems with the Bridge, please get in touch with us at: contact@Nuki.io. We will be waiting for your message.

author: Alexis Varin
comment: Does not work with Android 6.0 pairing fails. No problem with iOS 9 or 10 or Android 4.4. Contacted support by email, waiting for a fix.

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hello Alexis,
Have you tried installing the latest app version of the Smartlock firmware and the Nuki App? If the problem still persists, please send us an error log after activating the debug mode and trying the function or feature that is not correctly working. If you have questions, please do not hesitate to ask. Have a nice week!

author: Cedric Lawson
comment: Vor allem in Verbindung mit der Hardware Bridge die scheinbar mal eine Verbindung zum Schloss aufbaut und mal nicht. Dabei antwortet die Bridge auch auf Pings. Deshalb eigentlich überhaupt nicht nachvollziehbar, zumal die Bridge eine direkte 3m Entfernung zum Schloss hat ....

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hallo Cedric,

danke für dein Feedback. Konntest du dein Problem bereits lösen? Konnte dir der Support bei deinem Problem helfen?

author: Dušan K
comment: For the most part it's very good, one thing I think would make it better is a login system (username and password), not codes which need to be generated everytime a new device is to be used

author: Peter Meulders
comment: Works perfectly over Bluetooth and internet

author: Simon Landsheer
comment: Very happy with the Nuki lock and app works fine on both iOS and android

author: Alius S
comment: Poorly works with iOs - you have to wait for a minute while lock becomes online.. does not work with P9- lock restarts every time with error "restarting 4, cause=16". no online error descriptions: how can I fix this f.. error16? nuki team, will you fix this?  Thanks Nuki team, all issues are fixed

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hallo Alius,

we tried to fix this problem - could you give us some additional feedback, if this problem was fixed?

comment: Need more Features

author: Sam Burkels
comment: Not working on android O developer preview 1 on nexus 6P

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hello Sam,

We are working intensively on a solution.
Thank you for your patience!

Best regards!

author: Antun Milišić
comment: I like the app but would like it if it responded faster.

author: Peter Kis
comment: Great app, great device. Installed in less than 5 minutes, works like a charm. The bridge has a ridiculously short range, though - took me hours to find the optimal position for it. Now that it works, it connects very quickly. In connection with IFTTT it's truly fantastic. What would be desirable: an Android Wear app and / or one for Samsung Gear watches and integration with Amazon Echo and Google Home.

author: Thomas Hebendanz
comment: Easy install, easy to integrate with home automation by ifttt or HTTP. Works like a charm

author: Ottmar Francisca
comment: Only there could be a indicator in app that says battery low.  Did not use it one month and yet battery empty. Battery should last longer. I used provided 4x duracell. Other thing to add: administrator account login on other phone without losing given key codes and without. And possibility to send administration code to other user. (Invitation option) Needing to  calibrate again. FOR THE REST WORKS GREAT
title: Nuki doorlock

comment: Works perfectly in combination with this solid app.  Please add time based locking.  For example every day at 23:00 lock the door.
title: Awesome device

author: Mahmoud Hafez
comment: The reliability of the app and the fob as well needs to be improved. And the application didn't pair with the smart lock at all on android 7 (Naught) using my S7 edge. I use my wife's mobile to configure it!

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hallo Mahmoud,
danke für dein Feedback - wir arbeiten daran, dass wir die Zuverlässigkeit verbessern.
Hast du bereits mit dem Support aufgenommen? Ich bin sicher, dass du da nur eine Einstellung ändern musst und die Konfiguration mit deinem Telefon auch funktioniert.

title: Fairly well

author: Christian Lanz
comment: Ist aber unglaublich langsam beim Verbindungsaufbau.

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hallo Christian,

danke für dein Feedback - wir freuen uns sehr darüber!
Wir arbeiten weiterhin daran, dass die Geschwindigkeit verbessert wird.

title: Tut was es soll

author: Jan-Hendrik Peters
comment: The app is simple and well designed. Everything works flawlessly. I love that you can invite users with temporary permissions.

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hallo Jan,

danke für dein tolles Feedback - so soll es sein!

title: Works great

author: Sergey Lebedev
comment: Nexus 5x

reply.author: Nuki Home Solutions GmbH
reply.content:
Hello Sergey,

we tried to improve our app - do these problems still occur?

title: Not in fkn Bluetooth range

author: Chloe Jansen Van Rensburg
comment: It's great and convenient
